title: where do i redeem skin codes?
body: i have a quick question where is the skin/lol codes tab in the store in s6??

replies.body: In addition to Porocles's additional information, you can find Riot's current promotional content (free skins/champions) on the [Free Swag page here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-). Unchained Alistar also used to be a part of that promotion for Riot's Youtube page, but the redemption process never worked and it was recently removed; however, you can still obtain him by submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and requesting him, which Blitzcrank Bot should grant you shortly.

In addition to DTN's screenshots, we have a [Card Codes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202801810-Code-Cards-FAQ) guide that provides instructions and an intro on how codes work.  Keep in mind that the code may not work if it's expired or from another region.  I'm not aware of any current skin codes, aside from Alistar and Tristana.  Let me know if you have any questions!
